snippet.title: Keroro Gunsou: Meromero Battle Royale Z (PS2 Gameplay)
snippet.description: Multiplayer action spectacle from Bandai, featuring the Keroro gang. Plug in a multitap to go head-to-head with three other players and try out survival-style action challenges in 3D stages, featuring Gundam cameos, and plenty of gimmicks and items.
